skillTree.name: Flurry of Boughs
skillTree.description: When at war under the canopy it is like the trees themselves join the fray, striking from all directions.

skillTree.name: Nettles of Malice
skillTree.description: The forest has myriad ways to cause discomfort, pain and death to those foolhardy enough to make unwanted contact with its denizens.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +3 during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

Melee attack: +6 during forest battles
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Predator’s Instinct
skillTree.description: When one knows ways to inflict incapacitating injury, even upon that which is hard to kill, everything is prey.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: Ancient Attendant
skillTree.description: Long before the arrival of the Elves, it was the Branchwraiths who served the treemen and tamed the winds of magic.

skillTree.name: Dark Spirit
skillTree.description: Not all spirits of Athel Loren are selfless, some are malevolent and twisted.

skillTree.name: Wyssan's Wildform
skillTree.description: The spellcaster unleashes the beast within, using its fury to transform allies into bestial forms.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform"
Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Wyssan's Wildform Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Wild Heart
skillTree.description: The spellcaster attunes the magic of the wild, channelling its ancient and arcane power.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 13 seconds

skillTree.name: Flock of Doom
skillTree.description: With a mighty bellow, the caster invokes Corvus the Crow Lord, summoning his servants to peck at the foe's eyes.

ui_effects.description: ➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage
➕ 25% chance to deal 10 direct damage to 20 entities per second
➖ High chance opponent will resist damage

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Flock of Doom"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Flock of Doom Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Pann's Impenetrable Pelt
skillTree.description: Calling upon the beast spirits of the wild, the caster sheathes vulnerable flesh in unyielding fur and hide.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "Pann's Impenetrable Pelt Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Amber Spear
skillTree.description: Sounding a gnarled horn, the caster summons a glowing amber spear and hurls it at the foe with uncanny accuracy.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)
➕ Fires 1 projectile dealing 0 1250 and 0 175 explosion damage (2m)

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Amber Spear Upgraded"

skillTree.name: The Curse of Anraheir
skillTree.description: Nebulous nature spirits assail the foe, clawing at them with hands not nearly as insubstantial as they appear.

effects.description: Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Overcast spell: "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir"
Winds of Magic cost: -2 for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"
Miscast base chance: -10% for "The Curse of Anraheir Upgraded"

skillTree.name: Transformation of Kadon
skillTree.description: Kadon, a master of forms, was able to shift his shape into anything he chose. This mastery is used to summon a Great Eagle, as if Kadon himself fights for you.

ui_effects.description: ➖ Spawned unit fights in this battle only
➖ Spawned unit fights in this battle only

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -6 for "Transformation of Kadon"

skillTree.name: Earthing
skillTree.description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.

skillTree.name: Magical Reserves
skillTree.description: A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic cost: -1 for all spells

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 7 seconds

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Endurance of the Oak
skillTree.description: Taking their cue from the forest itself, the Lord endures and overcomes all.

skillTree.name: Impenetrable Bark
skillTree.description: Using the forest itself as a shield, this Lord is protected by their devotion to Athel Loren.

skillTree.name: Tempered Rigour
skillTree.description: When to strike, when to block, when to dodge. These are all skills the warriors of Athel Loren must perfect.

skillTree.name: Violent Delights
skillTree.description: There is no greater thrill than to be in the midst of battle, slaughtering in the forest's name.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Birch
skillTree.description: Dryads which shape shift into their Birch aspect take on a silvery-white appearance like birch trees, with a mass of delicate yellow green or tawny yellow foliage for hair. They are extremely vicious and spiteful and lash the foe with their long fingers which cut into flesh.

effects.description:
Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Dryads units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Dryads units
	(Hero's army)

Armour-piercing weapon damage: +4 for Dryads units
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.name: Oak
skillTree.description: When Dryads shape shift into their Oak aspect, they become more robust and resilient to wounds. They assume a green or brown skin and their limbs thicken. Their hair becomes a mass of oak leaves and acorns.

skillTree.name: Willow
skillTree.description: In their Willow aspect, Dryads change into creatures with green skin and extremely long yellowish green hair which hangs down around them like the leaves of the weeping willow tree. Their fingers extend into incredibly long, whip-like willow twigs.

skillTree.name: Call of the Woods
skillTree.description: The Lord embodies the forest; as a result of this, their warriors feel a greater call to defend it.

skillTree.name: Howl of the Forest
skillTree.description: The Lord's troops are charged to fight for Athel Loren, for their very souls are tethered to its fate.

skillTree.name: Renowned
skillTree.description: A legendary presence, on the battlefield and off.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Valet
skillTree.description: My lord, I believe I’ve found something of interest...

effects.description:
Magic item drop chance: +3%
	(Heroes in local region)

Magic item drop chance: +7%
	(Heroes in local region)

Magic item drop chance: +15%
	(Heroes in local region)

skillTree.name: Inspirational
skillTree.description: We all must fight, no matter our station.

skillTree.name: Retinue: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: I’ve managed to procure some additional supplies for the troops, my lord.

effects.description: Attrition: -3% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -7% casualties suffered from all attrition
Attrition: -15% casualties suffered from all attrition

skillTree.name: Great Orator
skillTree.description: We will not allow them to take our homes, our lands!

skillTree.name: Retinue: Physician
skillTree.description: We will establish triage and treatment centers as soon as we make camp, my lord.

skillTree.name: Replenish Troops
skillTree.description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 7%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 12%

skillTree.name: Stimulate Growth
skillTree.description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.name: Damage Walls
skillTree.description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.name: Wound
skillTree.description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 4% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 10% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 18% chance of wounding target

skillTree.name: Block Army
skillTree.description: To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

skillTree.name: Maintenance
skillTree.description: FACTIONWIDE: all source of income: -0,5% and characters upkeep: +1%. Effects are additive. Negated on level 30 of character.

backgroundSkills.name: Aspect of the Oak
backgroundSkills.description: Not even the fiercest weather conditions can strike down a hardy and long-lived oak, for it endures all seasons.

backgroundSkills.name: Aspect of the Birch
backgroundSkills.description: A birch’s oils can soften its wood, but once dry can harden branches into lethal clubs of war.

backgroundSkills.name: Aspect of the Willow
backgroundSkills.description: The willow is a harbinger of spring, and a conduit of lifeforces that can bolster a tree to withstand the direst of circumstances.

backgroundSkills.name: Lamentation of Despairs
backgroundSkills.description: The Despairs are among the most feared Spites within Athel Loren, their arrival always foretelling imminent death.

ui_effects.description: ➕ Fires 10 projectiles each dealing 0 75 damage and 50 0 explosion damage (10m)
➕ Lowers enemy leadership by -10 for 30 seconds
➖ Strikes any combatants in its path

backgroundSkills.name: Annoyance of Netlings
backgroundSkills.description: Scurrying over their host with feverish abandon, Netlings snag the weapons of enemies that come too close with webs of magical filaments.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

backgroundSkills.name: Blight of Terrors
backgroundSkills.description: Mirthfully looming out from their host, Terrors take on their most fearsome aspect to dampen the spirits of their horrified prey.

backgroundSkills.name: Muster of Malevolents
backgroundSkills.description: Unleashed upon a foe, these aggressive manifestations of the forest are utilised for their needle-like arrows that inflict painful wounds from afar.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 15% chance of wounding target

ui_effects.description: ➕50% chance to deal 150 direct damage to 1 entitiy per second

backgroundSkills.name: Befuddlement of Mischiefs
backgroundSkills.description: The staring eyes and tattered wings of tiny, glowing Elves befuddle enemy minds, sending them into a sleep-like trance.

backgroundSkills.name: Cluster of Radiants
backgroundSkills.description: Radiants are sponges for magical energy, manifesting as little more than blurred shapes of pure light that beckon the Winds to their host.

effects.description:
Winds of Magic cost: +2 for all enemy spells
	(local enemy armies)

ui_effects.description: ➕ Improves power recharge rate by 1 every 33 seconds

backgroundSkills.name: Murder of Spites
backgroundSkills.description: Hiding in their hosts' hollows are fiendish forms, ready to strike out at any who draw near.

ui_effects.description: ➕100% chance to deal 2 direct damage to 4 entities per second

backgroundSkills.name: Pageant of Shrikes
backgroundSkills.description: Shrikes take on various frightening forms, moving like quicksilver to target the eyes, and even enter foes’ bodies to attack their very minds.

backgroundSkills.name: Resplendence of Luminescents
backgroundSkills.description: Bounding from branch to bow, the Luminescents’ magical spoors alight upon allies’ weapons to bestow a minor but lethal enchantment.
